localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.excerpt: To enhance your productivity, Tweek is built around a week calendar view without any hourly scheduling. We’d say it’s the best view to organize your life and work without stress. Use it online or https://tweek.so/calendar/printable it on the wall.
blogPost.body: To enhance your productivity, Tweek is built around a week calendar view without any hourly scheduling. We’d say it’s the best view to organize your life and work without stress. Use it online or https://tweek.so/calendar/printable it on the wall.
blogPost.title: Tweek Calendar - Minimal weekly planner and to-do list
blogPost.author: Karl Plaude

localize.description: 为了提高你的工作效率，Tweek是围绕着一周日历视图而建立的，没有任何时间安排。我们会说这是最好的视图，可以让你无压力地安排生活和工作。在线使用或https://tweek.so/calendar/printable 它在墙上。
localize.tagline: 最小的周计划和待办事项清单

localize.description: 爲了提高你的工作效率，Tweek是圍繞着一週日曆視圖而建立的，沒有任何時間安排。我們會說這是最好的視圖，可以讓你無壓力地安排生活和工作。在線使用或https://tweek.so/calendar/printable 它在牆上。
localize.tagline: 最小的周計劃和待辦事項清單

previous.excerpt: Alt lets you treat your sports card collection as an investment portfolio. You can buy and sell pre-authenticated cards on our exchange and track the current market value for all your assets with our integrated portfolio management view.
previous.title: Alt - Invest in sports cards just like stocks

localize.description: Alt让您把您的运动卡收藏当作一个投资组合。您可以在我们的交易所购买和出售预认证卡，并通过我们的综合投资组合管理视图跟踪您所有资产的当前市场价值。
localize.tagline: 投资体育卡就像投资股票一样

localize.description: Alt讓您把您的運動卡收藏當作一個投資組合。您可以在我們的交易所購買和出售預認證卡，並通過我們的綜合投資組合管理視圖跟蹤您所有資產的當前市場價值。
localize.tagline: 投資體育卡就像投資股票一樣

next.excerpt: Better collaboration for product teams in multiple time zones. Exchange video, voice, and screen recordings with your team at the tap of a button.
next.title: PingPong - Video messaging for remote teams

localize.description: 为多时区的产品团队提供更好的协作。只需轻点按钮，即可与您的团队交换视频、语音和屏幕记录。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的视频信息传递

localize.description: 爲多時區的產品團隊提供更好的協作。只需輕點按鈕，即可與您的團隊交換視頻、語音和屏幕記錄。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的視頻信息傳遞
